title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/ControlPanel":{"title":"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/ControlPanel","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab $:/tags/MoreSideBar","caption":"CME","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/TiddlyWiki","text":"!! <$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.language.title]]}}}/> <$wikify name="rendered" text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.language.description]]}}} output=html><> <$select tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" index="language"> <$list filter="[[system]] [all[tiddlers+shadows]!is[draft]!field:cmei18n[]get[cmei18n]split[ ]!is[blank]regexp[\w+-\w+]]"> --- !! <$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.realtime-hint.title]]}}}/> <$wikify name="rendered" text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.realtime-hint.description]]}}} output=html><> : <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" index="realtime-hint" checked="true" unchecked="false" default="true"> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" stateIndex="realtime-hint" text="true"><$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.realtime-hint.button-on]]}}}/> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" stateIndex="realtime-hint" text="true"><$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.realtime-hint.button-off]]}}}/> --- !! <$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.clickable-links.title]]}}}/> <$wikify name="rendered" text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.clickable-links.description]]}}} output=html><> : <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" index="clickable-links" checked="true" unchecked="false" default="true"> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" stateIndex="clickable-links" text="true"><$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.clickable-links.button-on]]}}}/> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" stateIndex="clickable-links" text="true"><$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.clickable-links.button-off]]}}}/> --- !! <$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.hint-preview.title]]}}}/> <$wikify name="rendered" text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.hint-preview.description]]}}} output=html><> : <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" index="hint-preview" checked="true" unchecked="false" default="true"> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" stateIndex="hint-preview" text="true"><$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.hint-preview.button-on]]}}}/> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json" stateIndex="hint-preview" text="true"><$text text={{{[cmei18n[control-panel.hint-preview.button-off]]}}}/> "},"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/LICENSE":{"title":"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/LICENSE","text":"MIT License Copyright (c) 2023 Gk0Wk(nmg_wk@yeah.net) Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions: The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. "},"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/snippetslist/tw5-snippets.json":{"text":"[ { "i18n": true, "id": "blockquoteSingleline", "name": "tw-snippet.blockquoteSingleline.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.blockquoteSingleline.preview", "snippet": "> $1" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "blockquote", "name": "tw-snippet.blockquote.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.blockquote.preview", "snippet": "<<<\n$1\n<<<" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "blockquoteWithCSSClass", "name": "tw-snippet.blockquoteWithCSSClass.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.blockquoteWithCSSClass.preview", "snippet": "<<<$1\n$2\n<<<" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "blockquoteCitation", "name": "tw-snippet.blockquoteCitation.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.blockquoteCitation.preview", "snippet": "<<<\n$1\n<<< $2" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "codeblock", "name": "tw-snippet.codeblock.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.codeblock.preview", "snippet": "```$1\n$2\n```" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "image", "name": "tw-snippet.image.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.image.preview", "snippet": "[img[$1]]" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "dash", "name": "tw-snippet.dash.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.dash.preview", "snippet": "---" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "definitions", "name": "tw-snippet.definitions.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.definitions.preview", "snippet": "; $1\n: $2\n" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "codeinline", "name": "tw-snippet.codeinline.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.codeinline.preview", "snippet": "`$1`" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "bold", "name": "tw-snippet.bold.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.bold.preview", "snippet": "''$1''" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "italic", "name": "tw-snippet.italic.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.italic.preview", "snippet": "//$1//" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "underlinescore", "name": "tw-snippet.underline.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.underline.preview", "snippet": "__$1__" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "superscript", "name": "tw-snippet.superscript.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.superscript.preview", "snippet": "^^$1^^" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "subscript", "name": "tw-snippet.subscript.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.subscript.preview", "snippet": ",,$1,," }, { "i18n": true, "id": "deleteStrikeThrough", "name": "tw-snippet.deleteStrikeThrough.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.deleteStrikeThrough.preview", "snippet": "~~$1~~" }, { "i18n": true, "id": "center", "name": "tw-snippet.center.name", "preview": "tw-snippet.center.preview", "snippet": "
$1
" } ] ","type":"application/json","title":"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/snippetslist/tw5-snippets.json","tags":"$:/CodeMirrorEnhanced/SnippetsList"},"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json":{"text":"{ "language": "system", "realtime-hint": "true", "clickable-links": "true", "hint-preview": "true" } ","type":"application/json","title":"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/config.json"},"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/i18n/en-GB.json":{"text":"{ "readme": [ "View more on [[~GitHub Repo|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced]].", "", "CodeMirror editor for TiddlyWiki provides a flexible and rich extension framework (including highlighting, completion, preview and other features), anyone can use this framework to write extension plug-ins for the editor! Currently based on this framework to achieve the following features.", "", "* TiddlyWiki5 (`text/vnd.tiddlywiki`) syntax highlighting.", "* Wiki link auto-tip; * Tiddler preview; * TiddlyWiki5 (`text/vnd.tiddlywiki`)", "* Tiddler preview; * Tiddler preview.", "* Clickable links.", "", "More features are in development, welcome to join!", "", "> This plugin uses the flexible and powerful <$text text=\"TiddlyWiki\" /> development framework [[Tiddly.ModernDev|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/Modern.TiddlyDev]]" ], "control-panel": { "language": { "title": "Current language used by the plugin", "description": [ "Choose the language that suits you, `system` stands for follow the system preference.", "If there is no language that suits you, please ask in [[Issue|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/issues]], anyone is welcome to contribute code!" ] }, "realtime-hint": { "title": "Realtime-hint when typing", "description": "Real-time code completion hints like VSCode while typing (currently only ~WikiLink completion is implemented) and no need to activate with Ctrl+Space.", "button-on": "Real-time code completion is enabled", "button-off": "Real-time code completion is disabled" }, "clickable-links": { "title": "Clickable links", "description": "Whethere WikiLinks and URLs are clickable.", "button-on": "Clickable links is enabled", "button-off": "Clickable links is disabled" }, "hint-preview": { "title": "Hint preview", "description": "When auto-completion is performed, a small document/preview box pops up to the right of the completion box based on the selected suggestion entry.", "button-on": "Hint preview is enabled", "button-off": "Hint preview is disabled" } }, "tw-snippet": { "blockquoteSingleline": { "name": "single line blockquote", "preview": [ "!! Single-line Block Quotes", "", "> Quoted text", "> Another line of quoted text", "", "!! You can also nest quotes like this:", "", "> A top quote", ">> A subquote", "> Another top quote", "", "!! You can also mix block quotes with other list items. For example:", "", "* List One", "** List Two", "**> A quote", "**> Another quote", "* List Three" ] }, "blockquote": { "name": "blockquote", "preview": ["!! Multi-line block quotes", "", "<<<", "This is a block quoted paragraph", "", "written in English", "<<<"] }, "blockquoteWithCSSClass": { "name": "blockquoteWithCSSClass", "preview": ["!! CSS classes can be added to a block quote", "", "<<<.tc-big-quote", "A dramatic quote", "<<< Somebody Important"] }, "blockquoteCitation": { "name": "blockquoteCitation", "preview": ["!! A citation can be added to the quote like this", "", "<<<", "Computers are like a bicycle for our minds", "<<< Steve Jobs"] }, "codeblock": { "name": "codeblock", "preview": [ "!! You can use triple backticks ``` to mark code blocks", "", "", "```", "This will be monospaced", "```", "", "", "To be interpreted correctly, the three backticks need to be at the start of the line and immediately followed by a line-break.", "", "Be aware that any preceding paragraph content should be properly terminated with a double line break, too. So, this example is wrong:", "", "
",
        "This is an ordinary paragraph",
        "```",
        "This will be monospaced",
        "```",
        "
", "", "The correct version is:", "", "
",
        "This is an ordinary paragraph",
        "",
        "```",
        "This will be monospaced",
        "```",
        "
", "", "Note that some keyboard layouts treat the backtick as a [[dead key|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dead_key]], making it hard to type. ", "The trick is to type three backticks followed by a space. Alternatively, type all six backticks in one go, then a space, and then move the cursor back three characters to type or paste the content." ] }, "dash": { "name": "dashes", "preview": [ "!! Insert a dash line.", "", "You can create an n-dash with a double hyphen -- and an m-dash with a triple hyphen ---. For example – this is an example — and so is this " ] }, "definitions": { "name": "Definitions", "preview": [ "!! Insert a Definitions.", "", "```tw5", "; Term being defined", ": Definition of that term", "; Another term", ": Another definition", "```", "", "That renders as:", "", "```", "Term being defined", " Definition of that term", "Another term", " Another definition", "```", "", "and the underlying HTML is:", "", "```html", "
Term being defined
Definition of that term
Another term
Another definition
", "```" ] }, "codeinline": { "name": "codeinline", "preview": [ "!! insert codeinline", "", "`backticks` for `code`", "", "* Alternatively, ``double backticks allows `embedded` backticks``" ] }, "bold": { "name": "bold", "preview": ["!! insert bold", "", "`''bold''` for ''bold text''"] }, "italic": { "name": "italic", "preview": ["!! insert italic", "", "`//italic//` for //italic text//"] }, "underline": { "name": "underline", "preview": ["!! insert underline", "", "`__underscore__` for __underscored text__"] }, "superscript": { "name": "superscript", "preview": ["!! insert superscript", "", "`^^superscript^^` for ^^superscripted^^ text"] }, "subscript": { "name": "subscript", "preview": ["!! insert subscript", "", "`,,subscript,,` for ,,subscripted,, text"] }, "deleteStrikeThrough": { "name": "strikeThrough", "preview": ["!! insert strikeThrough", "", "`~~strikethrough~~` for ~~strikethrough~~ text"] }, "image": { "name": "image", "preview": ["!! Insert a image.", "", "[img[$:/favicon.ico]]"] }, "center": { "name": "center", "preview": ["!! Centralize elements.", "", "
like this
"] } } } ","type":"application/json","title":"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/i18n/en-GB.json","cmei18n":"en-GB en default","cmei18n-namespace":"core"},"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/i18n/zh-Hans.json":{"text":"{ "readme": [ "如想了解更多，请关注我们的[[~GitHub Repo|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced]]。", "", "为TiddlyWiki的CodeMirror编辑器提供一个灵活而丰富的扩展框架(包括高亮、补全、预览等功能)，任何人都可以使用此框架为编辑器编写扩展插件！目前基于此框架实现的功能有：", "", "* TiddlyWiki5(`text/vnd.tiddlywiki`)语法高亮；", "* Wiki链接自动提示；", "* Tiddler预览；", "* 可点击链接；", "", "更多功能正在开发中，欢迎你的加入！", "", "> 本插件使用灵活而强大的 <$text text=\"TiddlyWiki\" /> 开发框架 [[Tiddly.ModernDev|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/Modern.TiddlyDev]]" ], "control-panel": { "language": { "title": "当前插件所使用的语言", "description": [ "选择适合你的语言，`system`代表跟随系统偏好。", "如果没有适合你的语言，请在[[Issue|https://github.com/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/issues]]中提出，欢迎任何人贡献代码！" ] }, "realtime-hint": { "title": "实时代码补全", "description": "无需Ctrl+Space，像VSCode一样，在输入时实时进行补全提示(现只支持WikiLink)。", "button-on": "实时代码补全已开启", "button-off": "实时代码补全已关闭" }, "clickable-links": { "title": "可点击的链接", "description": "WikiLinks和URL是否可以点击。", "button-on": "可点击链接已开启", "button-off": "可点击链接补全已关闭" }, "hint-preview": { "title": "补全时预览", "description": "自动补全时，根据所选建议条目，在补全框右侧弹出小的文档/预览框。", "button-on": "补全时预览已开启", "button-off": "补全时预览已关闭" } }, "tw-snippet": { "blockquoteSingleline": { "name": "单行块引用", "preview": [ "!! 单行块引用", "", "> 引用的文本", "> 另一行引号文本", "", "!! 你也可以像这样嵌套引号", "", "> 一个引文", ">> 一个副引文", "> 另一个引文", "", "!! 你也可以将块状引号与其他列表项混合", "", "* 清单一", "** 清单二", "**> 一个引文", "**> 另一个引文", "* 清单三" ] }, "blockquote": { "name": "块引用", "preview": ["!! 多行块引用", "", "<<<", "这是一个块引用段落", "", "写了两行中文", "<<<"] }, "blockquoteWithCSSClass": { "name": "带CSS类的块引用", "preview": ["!! CSS 类也可以加到引用里", "", "<<<.tc-big-quote", "一个戏剧性的引用", "<<< 一个重要的人"] }, "blockquoteCitation": { "name": "带引文来源的块引用", "preview": ["!! 一个引文来源也可以加到引用里", "", "<<<", "计算机就像我们思想的自行车", "<<< 史蒂夫-乔布斯"] }, "codeblock": { "name": "代码块", "preview": [ "!! 你可以使用三个反斜线```来标记代码块", "", "", "```", "这将是以等宽字体显示的。", "```", "", "", "为了正确显示，这三个反斜线需要在行的开头，并紧跟一个换行。", "", "请注意，任何前面的段落内容也应该用双倍的换行符来适当终止。因此，下面这个例子是错误的。", "
",
        "这是一个普通的段落",
        "```",
        "这将是以等宽字体显示的。",
        "```",
        "
", "", "正确的版本是。", "
",
        "这是一个普通的段落",
        "",
        "```",
        "这将是以等宽字体显示的。",
        "```",
        "
", "", "注意，有些键盘布局将反斜线视为[[死键|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dead_key]]，使其难以输入。", "诀窍是输入三个反斜线，然后是一个空格。或者，一次性输入所有六个回车键，然后是一个空格，然后将光标向后移动三个字符来输入或粘贴内容。" ] }, "dash": { "name": "破折号", "preview": ["!! 插入破折号", "", "您可以用 -- 生成一个 n-dash 字符、--- 生成一个 m-dash。", "例如 – 这是一个例子 — 这个也是"] }, "definitions": { "name": "定义清单", "preview": [ "!! 插入定义清单", "", "以此语法创建 HTML 定义清单：", "", "```tw5", "; Term being defined", ": Definition of that term", "; Another term", ": Another definition", "```", "", "显示结果：", "", "```", "Term being defined", " Definition of that term", "Another term", " Another definition", "```", "", "HTML 标记：", "", "```html", "
Term being defined
Definition of that term
Another term
Another definition
", "```" ] }, "codeinline": { "name": "内联代码", "preview": [ "!! 输入内联代码", "", "`反引号` 用于 `代码`", "", "* 另外，``连续两个反引号则为 `可嵌入` 反引号``" ] }, "bold": { "name": "粗体", "preview": ["!! 输入粗体", "", "`''粗体''` 显示 ''粗体字''"] }, "italic": { "name": "斜体", "preview": ["!! 输入斜体", "", "`//斜体//` 显示 //斜体字//"] }, "underline": { "name": "下划线", "preview": ["!! 输入下划线", "", "`__下划线__` 显示 __下划线__"] }, "superscript": { "name": "上标", "preview": ["!! 输入上标", "", "`^^上标^^` 显示 ^^上标^^字"] }, "subscript": { "name": "下标", "preview": ["!! 输入下标", "", "`,,下标,,` 显示 ,,下标,,字"] }, "deleteStrikeThrough": { "name": "删除线", "preview": ["!! 输入删除线", "", "`~~删除线~~` 显示 ~~删除文本~~"] }, "image": { "name": "图片", "preview": ["!! 插入图片", "", "[img[$:/favicon.ico]]"] }, "center": { "name": "居中", "preview": ["!! 居中元素", "", "
就像这样
"] } } } ","type":"application/json","title":"$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TW5-CodeMirror-Enhanced/i18n/zh-Hans.json","cmei18n":"zh-Hans zh-CN !important; } .CodeMirror-hint { width: 400px !important; color: <> !important; border-radius: 0 !important; padding: 2px 4px !important; } li.CodeMirror-hint-active { background: <> !important; color: <> !important; } li.cm-hacked-hint { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; white-space: nowrap; } li.cm-hacked-hint>span.hint-title { overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; } li.cm-hacked-hint>span.hint-title>span.hint-title-highlighted { background: <>; color: <>; } li.cm-hacked-hint>span.hint-type { padding-left: 10px; font-weight: bold; opacity: 0.5; } .CodeMirror-hints-append { min-height: 20em !important; width: 400px !important; resize: both; background: <>; word-wrap: break-word; color: <>; fill: <>; } span.cm-underlined { text-decoration-line: underline; } /* Enhance from and specially thank to https://github.com/adithya-badidey/TW5-codemirror-plus */ span.cm-superscript { vertical-align: super; font-size: 0.7em; line-height: 0.1em; } span.cm-subscript { font-size: 0.7em; line-height: 0.5; } pre.cm-quote-line { padding-left: 0.4em !important; border-left: #444 solid 0.2em !important; } .cm-code-block-line, .latex { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } span.cm-h1 { font-weight: 700; font-size: 1.383em; line-height: 1.802em; } span.cm-h2 { font-weight: 600; font-size: 1.296em; line-height: 1.602em; } span.cm-h3 { font-weight: 500; font-size: 1.215em; line-height: 1.424em; } span.cm-h4 { font-weight: 400; font-size: 1.138em; line-height: 1.266em; } span.cm-h5 { font-weight: 400; font-size: 1.067em; line-height: 1.125em; } span.cm-h6 { font-weight: 400; } span.cm-link { cursor: pointer; } span.cm-internallink, span.cm-externallink { cursor: pointer; font-weight: 800; } span.cm-internallink { text-decoration: none; }
